summary: Represents a lexical token as a string enriched with metadata such as type, source position, line and column numbers. Inherits from Python's str so it behaves like a normal string while exposing attributes that describe where the token appears in the original text.
business_intent: Enable the parser and other analysis tools to work with token objects that carry both their textual value and precise location information, facilitating error reporting, syntax tree construction, and further processing of the source code.
